# File lib/treetop/compiler/node_classes/declaration_sequence.rb, line 5
      def compile(builder)
        unless rules.empty?
          builder.method_declaration("root") do
            builder << "@root || :#{rules.first.name}"
          end
          builder.newline
        end
        
        declarations.each do |declaration|
          declaration.compile(builder)
          builder.newline
        end
      end
